bioghist.p: Samuel Moyerman (1893-1966) was the owner of the Philadelphia Autograph Company.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of documents of various Pennsylvania and Mid-Atlantic region railroad companies, 1846-1915. Materials include stock certificates and canceled stock certificates, receipts, bills of lading, notices to stockholders, annual reports, and correspondence. Companies represented in the collection include: the Beaver Meadow Rail Road and Coal Company; the Elmira, Courtland, and Northern Railroad Company; the Ithaca and Athens Railroad Company; the Lehigh and Mahony Railroad Company; the Lehigh Valley Coal and Navigation Company; the Montrose Railway Company; the Pacific Company; the Pennsylvania Railroad; the Quaker Railroad; and the Seneca County Railway. Of note are a letter, petition, and other papers related to a reduction of wages for workers at the Pennsylvania Railroad in 1874-1877.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
